bill_title: revise the period of time in which a refund of certain commercial motor vehicle license fees may be requested.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the period of time in which a refund of certain commercial motor vehicle license fees may be requested. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 32-9-21 be amended to read as follows: 32-9-21. Every motor carrier desiring to discontinue using a vehicle as a commercial motor vehicle, may, on or before the termination of any year as provided in § 32-9-17, return his commercial motor vehicle plates and certificates to the county treasurer of the county where the vehicle was registered together with his an application for such the discontinuance. Upon satisfactory evidence that such the carrier will not further operate such the vehicle as a commercial motor vehicle, the county treasurer shall issue to the person or corporation so applying a warrant for the amount due for the remaining months of that year less a five dollar administrative fee which shall be retained by the county. The commercial motor vehicle plates and certificates shall be in the possession of the county treasurer on or before the fifth day of the month to receive credit for that month. If the fifth day of the month is a Saturday, a Sunday, or a legal holiday, the plates shall be returned by the next day which is not a Saturday, a Sunday, or a legal holiday to receive credit for that month.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
